What are the treatments for Gerstmann's Syndrome ?,"There is no cure for Gerstmann's syndrome. Treatment is symptomatic and supportive. Occupational and speech therapies may help diminish the dysgraphia and apraxia. In addition, calculators and word processors may help school children cope with the symptoms of the disorder.",NINDS,Gerstmann's Synd
